extendedInfo.description: A simplistic battery saving clock widget with the beautiful theme colors of ICS!Important: The pro version of this app: Modern Digital Clock is a better digital clock widget with a lot more functions, like full option colors, showing next alarm, battery level, day of week, and more. It also contains no advertisements. Search for it on Google Play!Some cool features:* Choose from the 5 beautiful theme colors of ICS.* Touch link. You can link the widget to a desired website.* As an alternative to touch link, you can set the widget to go to the default Android alarms screen when touched.** Show seconds* Show date* AM-PM or 24 hoursTo use these feautures, open the ICS Digital Clock Widget app that comes with the package.[Installation]Android 4.0+: Go to the widgets tab of your app drawer, select (long press) ICS Clock Widget Small or Large and place it on the desired location at your home screen.Other android versions: Long press home screen, select widgets, choose ICS Digital Clock Widget Small or Large and place widget at desired location.â¢ Don't forget that this is a widget. You need to place one of the 2 choices from the Widgets menu to your home screen before you can really use this app.â¢ The Small version is recommended for those who have "show seconds" disabled, Large is for use with seconds enabled.â¢ Please rate if you like it :)â¢ Mail us!*Touch link: It happens (rarely) that this feature doesn't work from time to time. The reason is still unknown while we're working to fix it. Opening and closing the app soves the problem.Important: This app contains contextual notification advertisements. This means that you get notifications every now and then with advertisements that are related to what you're doing at that moment. Please be aware of this before downloading! (The pro version contains no ads, see the notice on top about it, Modern Digital Clock)Errors, feedback, suggestions for apps/widgets? flowappsinfo [at] gmail [.] com

reviews.title: Good for ad lovers
reviews.comment: It\'s a good clock widget but not special enough for me to tolerate intrusive push ads.

reviews.title: Great clock - hate ads
reviews.comment: Rated low because the advertising spoils the user experience of the otherwise perfectly functional app. Less intrusive ads please.

reviews.title: I like the clock but not all the ads
reviews.comment: The app is great i use it for a light morning alarm and clock for work. Considering the no app version

reviews.title: Advertising in status bar!
reviews.comment: There are plenty of free clocks. Advertising should never be in the status bar. Uninstall.

reviews.title: Mint
reviews.comment: Very nice looking clock. Would give five stars if the twelve hour clock didn\'t carry a zero in front of it :)

reviews.title: Just what I wanted
reviews.comment: I was looking for a minimalistic approach to a digital clock widget while still being able to launch the alarms app. Perfect screen presence without taking away from my wallpaper.

reviews.comment: I would give 5* but sometimes nothing happens when I touch the clock widget, i have it set to go to alarms .
